an5.50:3.4: vuddho ceva → vuḍḍho ceva (sya-all); buddho ceva (mr) | arahā ca → arahā cā’ti (?)
an5.50:7.1: bhadraṁ yānaṁ → bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni (sya-all, km); bhaddaṁ yānaṁ (pts1ed); bhadraṁ bhadraṁ yānaṁ (mr) | mahaccā → mahacca (bahūsu)
an5.50:18.4: Taggha, bhante, sokasallaharaṇo → taggha bhante sokasallaharaṇo (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
